com.ontolabs.ayllu.data

Interface DataVector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WekaDataVector

    public interface DataVector
    The Interface DataVector is the instance corresponding to single record from data. It has @see Feature as @see List corresponding to attributes and values for each. DataVector can have either Nominal/Categorical values as @see String or numeric as double.
